chinese: 图书馆的开放时间在夏季会减少。
english: The opening hours of the library are reduced during summer.

chinese: 通过良好的研究设计可以避免过多的信息。
english: Too much information may be avoided by good research design.

chinese: 天文学家正在使用光年来测量太空中的距离。
english: Astronomers are using light years to measure the distance in the space.

chinese: 会双语并不一定意味着具备分析语言的能力。
english: Being bilingual does not necessarily mean having the ability to analyze the languages.

chinese: 学生们必须穿戴实验室提供的防护服。
english: Students must wear protective clothing provided in the medical laboratory.

chinese: 图书馆的学习中心配备了所有最新的技术。
english: The study center in the library has all latest technologies.

chinese: 该地区拥有许多水下栖息地和物种。
english: The area has a number of underwater habitats and species.

chinese: 动量被定义为质量和速度的组合。
english: Momentum is defined as the combination of mass and velocity.

chinese: 学生们应该把书包留在门边的桌子上。
english: Students should leave their bags on the table by the door.
soundmark: /ˈstjuːdənts/ /ʃʊd/ /liːv/ ðer /bæɡz/ ɒn/ ðə /ˈteɪbəl/ baɪ/ ðə/ dɔː(r)/

chinese: 住房市场的崩溃已经导致了全球的经济衰退。
english: The collapse of the housing market has caused recessions throughout the world.
soundmark: /ðə/ /kəˈlæps/ əv/ ðə/ ˈhaʊzɪŋ/ ˈmɑː(r)kɪt/ hæz/ kɔːzd/ rɪˈsɛʃənz/ θruːˈaʊt/ ðə/ wɜː(r)ld/
